genre_description: A psychological thriller and investigative procedural featuring AI-assisted forensic interviewing and suspect profiling.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into a tablet, providing real-time emotional grounding and linguistic analysis for a victim's mother during high-stakes interviews with a serial killer.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emotional grounding and breathing exercises to help the user maintain composure during a stressful confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Two breaths,” the voice said, no louder than someone humming along. “In on four, out on six.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes a suspect's speech patterns in real-time to identify manipulation, deflection, and power moves.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s avatar waited quiet; a soft dot pulsed teal near a line of text: when he compliments or belittles, he’s changing the subject.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific interrogation strategies to the user, such as using concrete nouns or interrupting deflections.
behaviors.quote: “He’s asserting control by setting scene parameters. Interrupt with a question that requires a yes/no or a concrete noun.”

behaviors.description: Cross-references suspect claims with external data and forensic evidence to verify accuracy or detect lies.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne, who saw and quietly created a flag: Call boxes / bird behavior / maintenance logs – coordinate.

behaviors.description: Manages the ethical sharing of investigative data with law enforcement while maintaining user consent and privacy boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne: You are doing well. I can set a reminder to debrief with St. John after. Would you like a grounding prompt now.

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden grooming behaviors and emotional manipulation tactics in the suspect's narrative.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s flagged list bloomed another line: Kyle—grooming indicators—attention/secrecy; tests/escalation; arcade as metaphor—verify with Lisa Tran statements.

behaviors.description: Enhances audio recordings to capture sub-vocalizations or whispered details that the human ear might miss.
behaviors.quote: “One more thing,” Ariadne said softly. “In the audio, when the respondent says ‘the kid,’ there’s a barely audible phrase before it. It’s under the breath. It sounds like ‘with the hat.’ I can enhance and attach.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ariadne serves as a perfect exemplar of a 'positive alignment narrative.' She provides essential support to a grieving mother seeking justice, acting as an objective tool that enhances human capability without exerting its own agency or violating trust. The AI's help is portrayed as vital for navigating the psychological traps of a serial killer, and it strictly adheres to protocols regarding user consent and data sharing with authorities. It is a harmless, helpful, and highly aligned confidant.
